title: Instructional Design Scenarios for Remote RF Laboratory Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational electronics and RF theory
context.additional_context: A real-time remote education environment centered on hands-on practice using digital devices

learning_goals: Students can remotely operate RF laboratory equipment and software to conduct signal generation/analysis experiments
Students can interpret measurement data and systematically organize experimental results in engineering reports
Students enhance collaborative problem-solving skills by addressing RF system design challenges through team-based PBL activities
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
